adDetails: Print this ad for 10% off our entire inventory and/or 15% off our watch services. Floral & Gifts.99+ pride ourselves on exceptional customer satisfaction. We offer quality products and services while maintaining competitive pricing. Our watch services include: - Battery replacement from $5 (most brands). Renata (Swiss brand) battery lifespan is good for approximately 1-1.5 year. - Link adjustment from $3 - Watch band replacement, strap (genuine leather) from $5 and bracelet (metal link) from $11. We're conveniently located off Hwy 680 in San Jose on 2355 McKee Road, across McDonalds and Round Table Pizza. Our hours of operation are: Mon-Fri 9:30 am -- 6:30 pm, Sat 10:00 am -- 6:00 pm, and Sun 10:00am -- 5:00 pm ** Call us at show contact info or email us: kfashiongift at gmail.com. **
